      • MongoDBConnector

        public MongoDBConnector(java.lang.String dbUrl,
                java.lang.String dbPort,
                java.lang.String dbName,
                java.lang.String tweetsCollectionName)
                 throws java.net.UnknownHostException
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        dbUrl - ip of the db
        dbPort - port of the mongoDB ("27017" as default")
        dbName - mongo DB name
        tweetsCollectionName - name of the collection that contains the tweets
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException
